summary: TL* THE CONTACT CALLED ON BEHALF OF HER GRANDSON WHO OWNS A 2013 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE PASSENGER'S SIDE FRONT DOOR OPENED WHILE DRIVING. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THE HORN STARTED TO HONK INDEPENDENTLY. THE DRIVER ATTEMPTED TO CLOSED THE DOOR HOWEVER, THE DOOR FAILED TO LATCH SECURELY. THE CONTACT USED A ROPE AND SECURED THE DOOR. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO SPRADLEY BARR FORD LINCOLN GREELEY (4901 W 29TH ST, GREELEY, CO 80634), BUT WAS NOT DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED BY THE DEALER THAT THERE WAS NO RECALL ON THE VEHICLE FOR THE DOOR LATCHES. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS PREVIOUSLY REPAIRED UNDER AN UNKNOWN RECALL HOWEVER, THE RECALL REPAIR FAILED TO STOP THE FAILURE FROM OCCURRING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE RECALL REPAIR WAS A ONE-TIME FREE REPAIR. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 101,000.
